author: dreid
msg: The 'pools are sms' patch.  Think I got everything :)
To use the patch you need to add --enable-sms into the configure
line. You'll also need to do a make clean before rebuilding as
we use defines for apr_palloc and so on...

author: dreid
msg: Remove the old apr_pools.c file hich is no longer used.

author: trawick
msg: get rid of some unnecessary checking of apr_socket_t in apr_connect()
if the fd is bad, the kernel is sure to let us know
we no longer care about remote addr field at this point

author: trawick
msg: handle APR timeouts on the socket
